attributes.action: Suspend foreign aid with immediate effect
attributes.additional_details:
It's very clear that Great Britain isn't spending it's money wisely and not putting Great Britain first.
The output of the budget clearly isn't going to achieve what we need it to.
We shouldn't be spending money on things we can't afford as a nation.
We have bigger priorities to fix here firstly.
attributes.background: We need to temporarily suspend foreign aid in order to heal the wounds of Great Britain and fix the foundations.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop all foreign aid
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700263
